channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- InfoSphere Information Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- InfoSphere Information Server

item.title: CVE-2018-1701|2024-08-05T04:07:44.331Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an authenciated user under specialized conditions to inject commands into the installation process that would execute on the WebSphere Application Server. IBM X-Force ID: 145970.

item.title: CVE-2018-1917|2024-08-05T04:14:39.373Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 could allow an authenticated user to access JSP files and disclose sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 152784.

item.title: CVE-2018-1994|2024-08-05T04:14:39.709Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.5 and 11.7 is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database. IBM X-Force ID: 154494.

item.title: CVE-2018-1845|2024-08-05T04:14:38.691Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 150905.

item.title: CVE-2018-1727|2024-08-05T04:07:44.405Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 9.1, 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 147630.

item.title: CVE-2018-1906|2024-08-05T04:14:38.798Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7could allow an authenticated user to download code using a specially crafted HTTP request. IBM X-Force ID: 152663.

item.title: CVE-2018-1454|2024-08-05T03:59:39.133Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly enable HTTP Strict Transport Security. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information using man in the middle techniques. IBM X-Force ID: 140089.

item.title: CVE-2018-1899|2024-08-05T04:14:38.536Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 could allow an attacker to change one of the settings related to InfoSphere Business Glossary Anywhere due to improper access control. IBM X-Force ID: 152528.

item.title: CVE-2018-1432|2024-08-05T03:59:39.094Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 9.1, 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-frame scripting which is a vulnerability that allows an attacker to load Information Server components inside an HTML iframe tag on a malicious page. The attacker could use this weakness to devise a Clickjacking attack to conduct phishing, frame sniffing, social engineering or Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 139360.

item.title: CVE-2018-1518|2024-08-05T04:07:42.935Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is affected by a weak password encryption vulnerability that could allow a local user to obtain highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 141682.

item.title: CVE-2018-1895|2024-08-05T04:14:38.639Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.3, 11.5, and 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 152159.

item.title: CVE-2023-50953|2024-08-02T22:23:44.035Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 275775.

item.title: CVE-2023-50303|2024-08-02T22:16:46.548Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 273333.

item.title: CVE-2023-50954|2024-08-02T22:23:44.104Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 returns sensitive information in URL information that could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 275776.

item.title: CVE-2023-50955|2024-08-02T22:23:43.870Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow an authenticated privileged user to obtain the absolute path of the web server installation which could aid in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 275777.

item.title: CVE-2023-50952|2024-08-02T22:23:44.045Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 275774.

item.title: CVE-2023-50964|2024-08-02T22:23:43.916Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 276102.

item.title: CVE-2023-35022|2024-08-02T16:17:04.193Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a local user to update projects that they do not have the authorization to access. IBM X-Force ID: 258254.

item.title: CVE-2024-35119|2024-08-02T03:07:46.455Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in a stack trace. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 290342.

item.title: CVE-2024-37533|2024-08-02T03:57:39.516Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 could disclose sensitive user information to another user with physical access to the machine. IBM X-Force ID: 294727.

item.title: CVE-2024-28794|2024-08-02T00:56:58.335Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20information%20server
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Information Server 11.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 286831.
